svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2022-02-08T15:09:09.553Z" agent="5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/97.0.4692.99 Safari/537.36" etag="mroVW64XSf_6yeCvPnD9" version="16.5.3" type="device"><diagram id="qI5gGp4sIuEvTqHYfYUw" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

g.text: Crystal
+ field: Colour (integer)
this attribute uses a number from 1-3 to represent the colour of a gem
+ field: Images (array of image files)
this contains the images used for all different colours of gem and is used
depending on the colour attribute
+ field: Coordinates (array)
these are the x and y coordinates of the crystal on the screen, which
determines where it is rendered
+ field: Exists (boolean)
this is to represent if the crystal exists as after the player picks it up is should
disappear and stop existing in the game
+ method: Collided
this method is called when the player has collided with a crystal it increases
the players amount of the correct colour crystal by one and then sets the
exists attribute to false
+ method: Draw
this method checks whether the crystal exists using the exists attribute and
if it does then it renders the correct image for the colour attribute from
images at the coordinates from the coordinates attribute
